comments.author: Bryan Keith
comments.body: hmmm, today's report doesn't sound good for Flagstaff tomorrow. That was my plan, but I might hit the flats north of town instead. Anyone have more information about current cycling conditions on Flagstaff? Bryan

comments.author: Steve
comments.body: Hey, Bryan! Actually, Flagstaff was in excellent shape yesterday when Greg and I rode up to the Amphitheater Road. I'll bet the top section is in good shape too, if you don't mind sand in the corners. I'll take sand over ice any day. Anyhow, happy trails!
